name: Dawnbreaker of Smiting
description: Arm yourself with Meridia's sacred sword and dispense her retribution, dealing 3600 Physical Damage to enemies in front of you, an additional 4314 Physical Damage over 6 seconds, and stunning them for 2 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the damage and stuns enemies hit.
